languages.text: "Частично. Я все еще не знаю все ответы... но теперь, по крайней мере, мне стали яснее мотивы и причины".

traits.locale_text: "Частично. Я все еще не знаю все ответы... но теперь, по крайней мере, мне стали яснее мотивы и причины".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Some of them. I still do not have all the answers... but now the motives and reasons are clearer to me."
languages.original_text: "Частично. Я все еще не знаю все ответы... но теперь, по крайней мере, мне стали яснее мотивы и причины".

traits.locale_text: "Some of them. I still do not have all the answers... but now the motives and reasons are clearer to me."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Some of them. I still do not have all the answers... but now the motives and reasons are clearer to me."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Some of them. I still do not have all the answers... but now the motives and reasons are clearer to me."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Some of them. I still do not have all the answers... but now the motives and reasons are clearer to me."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “一部分得到了答案，还有一部分尚不清楚……但现在，我更了解那些事情的动机与原因了。”
languages.original_text: "Some of them. I still do not have all the answers... but now the motives and reasons are clearer to me."

traits.locale_text: “一部分得到了答案，还有一部分尚不清楚……但现在，我更了解那些事情的动机与原因了。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Algunas. No tengo todas las respuestas... pero ahora sus motivos y razones me quedan más claros».
languages.original_text: "Some of them. I still do not have all the answers... but now the motives and reasons are clearer to me."

traits.locale_text: «Algunas. No tengo todas las respuestas... pero ahora sus motivos y razones me quedan más claros».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「いくつかはな。まだすべての答えがはっきりしたわけじゃあないが…動機と理由はわかった」
languages.original_text: "Some of them. I still do not have all the answers... but now the motives and reasons are clearer to me."

traits.locale_text: 「いくつかはな。まだすべての答えがはっきりしたわけじゃあないが…動機と理由はわかった」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Certaines, oui. Même si je n'ai pas toutes les réponses... je comprends mieux les motivations et les raisons. »
languages.original_text: "Some of them. I still do not have all the answers... but now the motives and reasons are clearer to me."

traits.locale_text: « Certaines, oui. Même si je n'ai pas toutes les réponses... je comprends mieux les motivations et les raisons. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Auf ein paar. Ich habe immer noch nicht alle Antworten ... aber ich kenne jetzt die Motive und Gründe."
languages.original_text: "Some of them. I still do not have all the answers... but now the motives and reasons are clearer to me."

traits.locale_text: "Auf ein paar. Ich habe immer noch nicht alle Antworten ... aber ich kenne jetzt die Motive und Gründe."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Bazılarına... Hâlâ tüm cevapları alamadım ama... Şimdi gerekçeler de nedenler de benim için daha açık."
languages.original_text: "Some of them. I still do not have all the answers... but now the motives and reasons are clearer to me."
